title: Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
description: Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
OB: When selecting line 22, there are 5 joinpoints visible instead of the expected 3. When selecting line 68, there are no joinpoints visible instead of the expected 2. Right-clicking the marker at line 68 and choosing "advises" shows all 5 joinpoints.
EB: The cross reference view and markers should correctly display the joinpoints assigned to advice. When selecting line 22, only 3 joinpoints should be visible. When selecting line 68, 2 joinpoints should be visible. The "advises" option when right-clicking on the marker at line 68 should only show the relevant joinpoints.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Select line 22 and observe the number of joinpoints displayed. 2. Select line 68 and observe the number of joinpoints displayed. 3. Right-click on the marker at line 68 and choose "advises" to see the joinpoints displayed.
